mapper.select: SELECT (@row_number := @row_number + 1) AS rowNumber, t.TABLE_SCHEMA AS databaseName, GROUP_CONCAT(t.TABLE_NAME SEPARATOR ',') AS tableNames FROM information_schema.`TABLES` AS t, (SELECT @row_number := 0) AS rn WHERE t.TABLE_SCHEMA NOT IN ('sys', 'information_schema', 'performance_schema', 'mysql') AND t.ENGINE <> 'InnoDB' GROUP BY databaseName
